documentation.text:
@dev This contract is an integral part of the converter registry,
 and it serves as the database contract that holds all registry data.
 The registry is separated into two different contracts for upgradeability - the data contract
 is harder to upgrade as it requires migrating all registry data into a new contract, while
 the registry contract itself can be easily upgraded.
 For that same reason, the data contract is simple and contains no logic beyond the basic data
 access utilities that it exposes.

@dev initializes a new ConverterRegistryData instance
 @param _registry address of a contract registry contract

@dev adds an anchor
 @param _anchor anchor

@dev removes an anchor
 @param _anchor anchor

@dev adds a liquidity pool
 @param _liquidityPoolAnchor liquidity pool

@dev removes a liquidity pool
 @param _liquidityPoolAnchor liquidity pool

@dev returns the number of anchors
 @return number of anchors

@dev returns the list of anchors
 @return list of anchors

@dev returns the number of liquidity pools
 @return number of liquidity pools

@dev returns the list of liquidity pools
 @return list of liquidity pools

@dev returns the number of convertible tokens
 @return number of convertible tokens

@dev returns the list of convertible tokens
 @return list of convertible tokens

devdoc.details: This contract is an integral part of the converter registry, and it serves as the database contract that holds all registry data. The registry is separated into two different contracts for upgradeability - the data contract is harder to upgrade as it requires migrating all registry data into a new contract, while the registry contract itself can be easily upgraded. For that same reason, the data contract is simple and contains no logic beyond the basic data access utilities that it exposes.

acceptOwnership().details: used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer

params._registry: address of a contract registry contract

getConvertibleToken(uint256).details: returns the convertible token at a given index

returns._0: convertible token at the given index

getConvertibleTokenCount().details: returns the number of convertible tokens

getConvertibleTokenSmartToken(address,ui.details: returns the anchor associated with a given convertible token at a given index

returns._0: liquidity pool at the given index

getLiquidityPoolCount().details: returns the number of liquidity pools

getLiquidityPools().details: returns the list of liquidity pools

getSmartToken(uint256).details: returns the anchor at a given index

restrictRegistryUpdate(bool).details: restricts the permission to update the contract-registry

params._onlyOwnerCanUpdateRegistry: indicates whether or not permission is restricted to owner only
